torchnlp.utils.resplit_datasets(dataset, other_dataset, random_seed=None, cut=None)[source]Â¶

Deterministic shuffle and split algorithm.

Given the same two datasets and the same random_seed, the split happens the same exact way every call.

Parameters:
  • dataset (lib.datasets.Dataset) â€“ First dataset.
  • other_dataset (lib.datasets.Dataset) â€“ Another dataset.
  • random_seed (int, optional) â€“ Seed to control the shuffle of both datasets.
  • cut (float, optional) â€“ If defined it is the percentage of rows that first dataset gets after split otherwise the original proportions are kept.
Returns:

dataset (lib.datasets.Dataset) other_dataset (lib.datasets.Dataset)
